   19: %%
   20: -module(beam_ssa_check_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% Runs tests checking the structure of BEAM SSA code.
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("stdlib/include/erl_compile.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   30: 
   31:          alias_checks/1,
   32:          annotation_checks/1,
   33:          appendable_checks/1,
   34:          bs_size_unit_checks/1,
   35:          no_reuse_hint_checks/1,
   36:          no_type_info_checks/1,
   37:          private_append_checks/1,
   38:          ret_annotation_checks/1,
   39:          sanity_checks/1,
   40:          tuple_inplace_checks/1,
   41:          non_throwing_bifs/1]).
   42: 
   43: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   44: 
   45: all() ->
   46:     [{group,post_ssa_opt_dynamic},{group,post_ssa_opt_static}].
   47: 
   48: groups() ->
   49:     [{post_ssa_opt_static,test_lib:parallel(),
   50:       [alias_checks,
   51:        annotation_checks,
   52:        appendable_checks,
   53:        no_reuse_hint_checks,
   54:        no_type_info_checks,
   55:        private_append_checks,
   56:        ret_annotation_checks,
   57:        sanity_checks,
   58:        tuple_inplace_checks,
   59:        non_throwing_bifs]},
   60:      {post_ssa_opt_dynamic,test_lib:parallel(),
   61:       [bs_size_unit_checks]}].
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: init_per_group(post_ssa_opt_dynamic, Config) ->
   71:     TargetDir = dynamic_workdir(Config),
   72:     ct:log("Creating working directory for generated test cases: ~p~n",
   73:            [TargetDir]),
   74:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
   75:     Config;
   76: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_group(post_ssa_opt_dynamic, Config) ->
   80:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   81:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "dynamic"),
   82:     case proplists:get_bool(keep_generated, Config) of
   83:         false ->
   84:             ct:log("Removing working directory for generated test cases: ~p~n",
   85:                    [TargetDir]),
   86:             file:del_dir_r(TargetDir);
   87:         true ->
   88:             Config
   89:     end;
   90: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   91:     Config.
   92: 
   93: alias_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   94:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias, Config),
   95:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias_non_convergence, Config),
   96:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias_chain, Config),
   97:     run_post_ssa_opt(ss_depth_limit, Config).
   98: 
   99: annotation_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  100:     run_post_ssa_opt(annotations, Config).
  101: 
  102: appendable_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     run_post_ssa_opt(appendable, Config).
  104: 
  105: bs_size_unit_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     gen_and_run_post_ssa_opt(bs_size_unit_checks, Config).
  107: 
  108: no_reuse_hint_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  109:     run_post_ssa_opt(no_reuse_hint, Config).
  110: 
  111: no_type_info_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     run_post_ssa_opt(no_type_info, Config).
  113: 
  114: private_append_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     run_post_ssa_opt(private_append, Config).
  116: 
  117: tuple_inplace_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_checks, Config),
  119:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort0, Config),
  120:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort1, Config),
  121:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort2, Config),
  122:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort3, Config).
  123: 
  124: ret_annotation_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     run_post_ssa_opt(ret_annotation, Config).
  126: 
  127: sanity_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  128:     run_post_ssa_opt(sanity_checks, Config).
  129: 
  130: non_throwing_bifs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     run_post_ssa_opt(non_throwing_bifs, Config).
  132: 
  133: dynamic_workdir(Config) ->
  134:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  135:     filename:join(PrivDir, "dynamic").
  136: 
  137: run_post_ssa_opt(Module, Config) ->
  138:     File = atom_to_list(Module) ++ ".erl",
  139: 
  140:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  141:     Source = filename:join(DataDir, File),
  142:     run_checks(Source, post_ssa_opt, Config).
  143: 
  144: run_checks(SourceFile, Pass, _Config) ->
  145:     Flags = [binary, deterministic, {check_ssa,Pass}, report_errors],
  146:     case compile:file(SourceFile, Flags) of
  147:         {ok,_,_} -> ok;
  148:         error -> ct:fail({unexpected_error, "SSA check failed"})
  149:     end.
  150: 
  151: gen_and_run_post_ssa_opt(Base, Config) ->
  152:     BaseStr = atom_to_list(Base),
  153:     GenFilenameBase = "gen_" ++ BaseStr,
  154:     GenModule = list_to_atom(GenFilenameBase),
  155:     GenFilename = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  156:                                 GenFilenameBase ++ ".erl"),
  157:     ct:log("Compiling generator ~s~n", [GenFilename]),
  158:     {ok,GenModule,GenCode} = compile:file(GenFilename, [binary]),
  159:     {module,GenModule} = code:load_binary(GenModule, GenFilename, GenCode),
  160:     TargetFileName = filename:join(dynamic_workdir(Config), BaseStr ++ ".erl"),
  161:     ct:log("Generating ~s~n", [TargetFileName]),
  162:     ok = GenModule:generate(TargetFileName, Config),
  163:     run_checks(TargetFileName, post_ssa_opt, Config).
